brooklyn.entity.database.postgresql
[Java] Interface PostgreSqlNode

brooklyn.entity.trait.Identifiable
  DatastoreMixins.DatastoreCommon

          brooklyn.entity.database.postgresql.PostgreSqlNode
              brooklyn.entity.basic.SoftwareProcess

                              brooklyn.entity.database.DatastoreMixins.DatastoreCommon
All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable, DatastoreCommon, Entity, SoftwareProcess, DatabaseNode, Startable, HasShortName, DatastoreCommon
@Catalog(name="PostgreSQL Node", description="PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS)", iconUrl="classpath:///postgresql-logo-200px.png")
@ImplementedBy(PostgreSqlNodeImpl.class)
public interface PostgreSqlNode
extends DatabaseNode, DatastoreCommon, HasShortName, SoftwareProcess

PostgreSQL database node entity.

  • You may need to increase shared memory settings in the kernel depending on the setting of the SHARED_MEMORY_BUFFER key. The minimumm value is 128kB. See the PostgreSQL documentation.
  • You will also need to enable passwordless sudo.
